snippet: The airline said most flights would operate this weekend, after a three-day strike, although there was no sign the company and the pilots were closer to resolving their dispute.
abstract: Lufthansa says it expects to resume nearly normal flight operations after end of three-day strike by pilots; airline says most flights will operate as scheduled, although there is no sign company and pilots are any closer to resolving their dispute.
lead_paragraph: The airline said most flights would operate this weekend, after a three-day strike, although there was no sign the company and the pilots were closer to resolving their dispute.

headline.main: As Strike Winds Down, Lufthansa Plans a Return to Nearly Normal Service
headline.print_headline: After Strike, Lufthansa Plans Return to Normal Service
